article_title: City's North Queen garage opens Monday
article_text: Bernard Harris is a Lancaster Newspapers staff writer who covers transportation issues and Lancaster City Hall. He also blogs about bicycling at Road Apples and Potholes. He can be reached at bharris@lnpnews.com or (717) 481-6022. You can also follow@BHarris_LNP on Twitter.

article_metadata.news_keywords: , north queen street, parking, lancaster city, lancaster press building
article_metadata.author: BERNARD HARRIS | Staff Writer

og.description: Officially, Lancaster city’s new North Queen Street parking garage opens at 6 a.m. Monday.
